title: Christopher West - Introduction to the Theology of the Body
description:
Introduction to the Theology of the Body: An Adult Faith Formation Program Based on Pope John Paul II's Theology of the Body

This four talk introduction is the perfect series for parish or in-home groups. Gain a deeper appreciation of God's original plan for marriage and sexuality, and learn how this plan gives profound meaning to all of our lives. 

Four MP3s, about 45 minutes each

Disc 1 - What is the Theology of the Body and Why is it So Important?
Disc 2 - The Creation and Redemption of Man and Woman
Disc 3 - The Resurrection of the Body and the Heavenly Marriage
Disc 4 - The Sacrament of Marriage and the Language of Sexual Love
